feed.title: Brandon Wolfson
feed.subtitle: The home of Brandon Wolfson's machine learning, data science, and software engineering adventures.

entry.title: Poison Oak Classifier
entry.content:
Similar to my Big Cat Classifier, I made a simple web app that classifies images of leafs as poison oak or not! Check it out here!

If you’re interested in how I made this app, check out the GitHub repo here. Note, it may take about a minute for the app to launch.
entry.summary: Similar to my Big Cat Classifier, I made a simple web app that classifies images of leafs as poison oak or not! Check it out here!

entry.title: Big Cat Classifier App
entry.content:
I made a web app that classifies an image as either a lion, tiger, or leopard! Check it out here!

Note, it may take about a minute for the app to launch.

Note, this post will be updated with more information later! :)
entry.summary: I made a web app that classifies an image as either a lion, tiger, or leopard! Check it out here!

entry.title: Welcome to my Site!
entry.content:
Welcome to my personal website! Here I’ll showcase my technical projects, as well as write about any other topics I’m thinking about :).

Thanks for stopping by!
